Weekly Meal Plans

Get personalized weekly meal plans tailored to your preferences, dietary needs, and lifestyle. Cuvio's AI creates complete meal plans in under 2 minutes.

How Weekly Meal Plans Work

Cuvio's AI creates comprehensive meal plans that consider your preferences, nutritional goals, and available ingredients.

1

Set Your Preferences

Tell us about your dietary needs, cooking time, household size, budget, and any allergies or restrictions.

2

AI Generates Your Plan

Our AI creates a complete weekly meal plan with breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks tailored to your needs.

3

Shop & Cook

Get your smart shopping list, follow step-by-step recipes, and enjoy delicious meals all week long.

What's Included in Your Meal Plan

Every weekly meal plan comes with everything you need for successful meal planning and cooking.

Complete Meals

Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks for the entire week, with recipes tailored to your preferences and dietary needs.

  • ✓ 21+ meals per week
  • ✓ Variety of cuisines and flavors
  • ✓ Balanced nutrition

Smart Shopping Lists

Automatically generated shopping lists organized by store section, scaled to your household size, and optimized for efficiency.

  • ✓ Organized by store section
  • ✓ Scaled to household size
  • ✓ Check off items as you shop

Nutrition Tracking

Detailed nutritional information for every meal, including macros, calories, and micronutrients to help you meet your health goals.

  • ✓ Macro and calorie tracking
  • ✓ Micronutrient information
  • ✓ Daily nutrition summaries

Time Management

Cooking times and prep instructions that fit your schedule, with options for quick meals and meal prep strategies.

  • ✓ Cooking time estimates
  • ✓ Prep instructions
  • ✓ Meal prep suggestions

Flexibility

Swap any recipe for alternatives, choose from your favorites, or regenerate the entire plan. Shopping lists update automatically.

  • ✓ Recipe swapping
  • ✓ Favorites integration
  • ✓ Easy regeneration

Seasonal Optimization

Ingredients prioritized for seasonal availability in your location, ensuring better taste, nutrition, and value.

  • ✓ Seasonal ingredient focus
  • ✓ Local produce optimization
  • ✓ Cost-effective planning

Sample Weekly Meal Plans

See how Cuvio adapts meal plans to different lifestyles and dietary preferences.

Desk Warrior Plan

Quick, convenient meals for busy professionals

Monday

Breakfast: Overnight oats • Lunch: 15-min quinoa bowl • Dinner: Sheet pan salmon

Tuesday

Breakfast: Smoothie bowl • Lunch: Leftover salmon wrap • Dinner: One-pot pasta

Wednesday

Breakfast: Avocado toast • Lunch: Mason jar salad • Dinner: 20-min stir fry

Wellness Witch Plan

Nutrient-dense meals focused on superfoods and health

Monday

Breakfast: Chia pudding with berries • Lunch: Kale power bowl • Dinner: Turmeric salmon

Tuesday

Breakfast: Green smoothie • Lunch: Quinoa Buddha bowl • Dinner: Roasted vegetables

Wednesday

Breakfast: Acai bowl • Lunch: Hemp seed salad • Dinner: Spiced lentil curry
